**Photosynthetic pigments concentration**


```{r, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)

```
My data:
```{r}
summary(my_data)
```
```{r}
nacl <- my_data$NaCl_mM
pigment <- my_data$Pigment
concentration <- my_data$Concentration_mg_g_DW

my_data$NaCl_mM <- as.factor(my_data$NaCl_mM)
```

The resulting plot:

```{r}
ggbarplot(data = my_data, 
          x = 'Pigment', 
          y = 'Concentration_mg_g_DW',
          order = c('Chlorophyll a','Chlorophyll b','Carotenoids'),
          fill = 'NaCl_mM', 
          add=c('mean_sd'),
          position=position_dodge(0.7)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette='Greys')
```
